title: Preternaturals
description: Fifty years ago, the famed hero, Captain Valour, fought his dreaded nemesis for the fate of the city. The battle was long and furious, but by the end, both had disappeared. The age of the superhero was over . . .  . . . until now. Fantastically-gifted beings have again emerged from the population, causing panic among the general public. As Senator Jack Williams implements his plan to manage these "preternaturals," dark forces gather to oppose his efforts.  Author Allen Kensington delivers an exhilarating spin on the superhero tale with this new thriller, packed with enough action and suspense to satisfy any reader. Can the senator recruit his team and protect the city before it's too late? The answers lie within.
author: Allen Kensington
